item.title: Ship PWA Guided by Lighthouse
item.description: Photo by Robert Wiedemann Nowadays, PWA is so hyped. All the cool kids are implementing PWA, or on the way to implement it. It’s like a magic box, they said, what contains ultimate happiness for users. Wow it sounds awesome, right? How is it possible that I could miss this opportunity to stay as a member of the cool kids club? What is actually PWA? According to Google, Progressive Web Apps are user experiences that have the reach of the web, and are [1]:
